result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John Terry Malone Jr.

records.addlTxt: Jury trial on March 24, 2023 at 08:30 am.

9:57 AM Defendant John Terry Malone Jr. in court.  Attorney Michael Scholke in court for John Terry Malone Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Charles James Simono in court for the State of Wisconsin. Called 22CF106 and 22CF107. State understanding that may be a waiver of PH today. Scholke agrees and has went over the complaints in both cases, waives reading, has went over right to PH as well and provided forms to the court for each case. Court goes over the forms, waiving PH, finds he is freely, voluntarily and intelligently waiving his right to a PH, finds probable cause and binds over for trial on each case. Informations have not been filed. State files them in court, electronically and notes they mirror the complaint. Scholke waives reading of information with understanding that it mirrors the complaint, proceeds to ARGN and enters NG pleas to all counts in each case. Court accepts pleas and instructs Scholke to contact JA for a JT date, will schedule for PTC with the DA and a PLEAS as well and continues bond on each case.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 7, 2023 at 09:45 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 22, 2023 at 03:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on February 22, 2023 at 03:00 pm.
Pre-trial conference on February 7, 2023 at 09:45 am.

9:43 AM Defendant John Terry Malone Jr. in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court.  Prosecuting attorney Alexander Paul Seifert in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls 22CF106 and 22CF107. Court reviews file. Malone has stayed in close contact with SPD, no attorney yet. Court does have a report from them, continues bond on both cases, keep in constant in SPD, sets for AIA on 10/12/22 at 10:00 AM.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 12, 2022 at 10:00 am.

9:32 AM Prosecuting attorney Alexander Paul Seifert in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John Terry Malone Jr. in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court. Court calls 22CF106 and 22CF107. Court reviews files, no SPD appointment yet, continues bond, keep in contact with SPD, set both matters for AIA on 8/31/22 at 10:00.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for John Terry Malone Jr.
Current: 1785 Oconto Avenue, Wabeno, WI 54566 United States  (Effective: 07-26-2022)
Prior: 5607 We J Mogek Ct, Crandon, WI 54520
Adjourned initial appearance on August 3, 2022 at 09:30 am.

9:45 AM Prosecuting attorney Alexander Paul Seifert in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John Terry Malone Jr. in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court. Court calls 22CF106 and 22CF107. Court reviews file, no SPD appointment yet. Malone does keep in contact with them and they stated that they are still looking, also states that his family is trying to help him secure a lawyer in his own. Court continues bond on both matters, sets for another AIA on 7/27/22 at 10:00 AM.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:46 AM Prosecuting attorney Alexander Paul Seifert in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John Terry Malone Jr. in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court. Court calls 22CF106 and 22CF107. Court reviews file, defendant does qualify for SPD, reviews letter in file for them. Court directs Malone to call SPD back and make sure they are aware of both cases. Court continues bond, verifies address, sets for AIA on 7/6/22 at 9:45 AM.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on July 6, 2022 at 09:45 am.
Public Defender Status of Counsel Report

3:01 PM Prosecuting attorney Alexander Paul Seifert in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant John Terry Malone Jr. in court.  Plaintiff State of Wisconsin in court. Court calls 22CF106 and 20CF107. Malone does not have complaints. Clerk provides them in Court. Court reads charges and penalties and right to attorney and court appointed attorney for both cases. Malone understands charges and penalties, wants an attorney, states he will contact SPD. Court directs to contact SPD today and again reminds him of his right to court appointed attorney. Malone understands. Court continues bond on 22CF107. State - bond on 22CF106 - $500.00 signature. Court - bond on 22CF106 - $500.00 signature bond, no consumption of alcohol.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on June 15, 2022 at 10:45 am.
No contact with K. Skenandore or C. Frank.
